en-US.summary: Study flashcards hands-free with spaced repetition
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask flashcard tutor to start studying
Alexa, tell flashcard tutor to quiz me
en-US.name: Flashcard Tutor
en-US.description:
Transform your study time with voice-controlled flashcards! Flashcard Tutor uses scientifically-proven spaced repetition to help you remember anything. Perfect for studying while driving, cooking, or exercising.

Features:
• Hands-free studying with natural voice interaction
• Spaced repetition algorithm (same as Anki)
• Track your progress and accuracy
• Multiple deck support
• Encouraging AI tutor personality

Just say 'Alexa, open Flashcard Tutor' and start learning!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Sample testing instructions:
1. Say 'Alexa, open flashcard tutor'
2. Say 'Start studying'
3. Answer questions and grade difficulty
4. Say 'Stop' to end session
